title: Understanding Privacy-Aware Culture
text: To foster a privacy-aware culture, it's essential to think about how different teams within an organization interact and share information. Consider the importance of having a unified approach that connects these teams, even if they operate independently.

title: The Role of Communication
text: Think about how communication plays a role in creating a privacy-aware culture. How can teams ensure they are on the same page when it comes to privacy, even if they are working in different departments?
